snippet.title: Over-the-counter acne products: What works and why
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Bursting myths about acne
snippet.description: * WebMD Ben Grant woke up depressed the morning of his highschool graduation. That day, he would be commended for his musical talents, academic achievements, admission to Columbia University and triumphs on the varsity volleyball team. snippet.title: Top 2007 health breakthroughs for women
snippet.description:
* Let's face it. We live in a time when a "Your Friends Make You Fat" story gets headlined and blogged 24-7 (no matter that it was just one study in a doctors' journal), while the recent discovery of two (two!) genes linked to multiple sclerosis (MS) rates nary a peep.
http://www.cnn.com/2007/HEALTH/11/28/yir.health.breakthroughs/index.html
